text: Finally, sometimes transfers are driven by personal reasons. A player might want to move closer to family or experience a different culture. The transfer window is a period of high drama, strategic planning, and ultimately, a quest for sporting success. These factors often come to play especially during the time just before or after festivals like Onam, as players and staff travel around. Transfer fees are often quoted in Rs. and salaries can be very varied. Clubs could spend up to 5 Cr. Rs. on a single player, with weekly salaries of around 50,000 Rs. or more.
